name: Bottle Destroyer
description:
Bottle Destroyer is an endless shooter with simple mechanics and an infinite game loop that gets harder over time. It has minimal graphics and enjoyable gameplay.

CONTROLS:

Press the arrow keys to move left and right and space to shoot

Press escape to return to the main menu

GAMEPLAY:

Try to shoot the bottles,  but not the tanks behind them. You only have a small amount of time to shoot before losing the game.

Each time the score increases by 50, you will require one more shot to destroy any bottle.
